text: Enzo Perin (born 10 August 1933) is an Italian skier. He competed at the 1956 Winter Olympics, the 1960 Winter Olympics and the 1964 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Italian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:People from Brenner
title: Enzo Perin
